item.title: PostgreSQL-List
item.description:
PostgreSQL List

  • Scaling the GitLab database: In this article we’ll take a look at what we did to help solve these problems for both GitLab.com and self-hosted GitLab instances.

  • 2017-Honeybadger-Our Postgres Infrastructure

  • Using EXPLAIN ANALYZE to debug a slow SQL query

item.title: PostgreSQL-OpenSource-List
item.description:
PostgreSQL OpenSource List

  • pgcli : Postgres CLI with autocompletion and syntax highlighting.

  • 2019-PostgREST : PostgREST serves a fully RESTful API from any existing PostgreSQL database. It provides a cleaner, more standards-compliant, faster API than you are likely to write from scratch.

  • 2022-pgvector : Open-source vector similarity search for Postgres.
